trans-unit.resname: WOC·1 | Tegwyll, Duke of Splendor | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Tegwyll, Duke of Splendor
trans-unit.target: 辉美公爵特维尔

trans-unit.resname: WOC·1 | Tegwyll, Duke of Splendor | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Flying, deathtouch
trans-unit.target: 飞行，死触

trans-unit.resname: WOC·1 | Tegwyll, Duke of Splendor | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Other Faeries you control get +1/+1.
trans-unit.target: 由你操控的其他仙灵得+1/+1。

trans-unit.resname: WOC·1 | Tegwyll, Duke of Splendor | Card Text: Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: Whenever another Faerie you control dies, you draw a card and you lose 1 life.
trans-unit.target: 每当另一个由你操控的仙灵死去时，你抓一张牌且失去1点生命。

trans-unit.resname: WOC·1 | Tegwyll, Duke of Splendor | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: He weaves glamours as easily as breathing, his otherworldly beauty entrancing fae and mortal alike.
trans-unit.target: 他举止优雅华贵、魅力四射，美貌超凡脱俗，令仙儿与凡人均为之着迷。

trans-unit.resname: WOC·2 | Ellivere of the Wild Court | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Ellivere of the Wild Court
trans-unit.target: 幻野廷的莉薇尔

trans-unit.resname: WOC·2 | Ellivere of the Wild Court | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever Ellivere of the Wild Court enters the battlefield or attacks, create a Virtuous Role token attached to another target creature you control. (If you control another Role on it, put that one into the graveyard. Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 for each enchantment you control.)
trans-unit.target: 每当幻野廷的莉薇尔进战场或攻击时，派出一个善人角色衍生物，并贴附在另一个目标由你操控的生物上。（如果其上已有另一个你操控的角色，则将已有之角色置入坟墓场。你每操控一个结界，所结附的生物便得+1/+1。）

trans-unit.resname: WOC·2 | Ellivere of the Wild Court | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever an enchanted creature you control deals combat damage to a player, draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 每当一个由你操控且受有灵气的生物对任一牌手造成战斗伤害时，抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: WOC·3 | Alela, Cunning Conqueror | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Alela, Cunning Conqueror
trans-unit.target: 黠智霸主阿莉莱

trans-unit.resname: WOC·3 | Alela, Cunning Conqueror | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Flying
trans-unit.target: 飞行

trans-unit.resname: WOC·3 | Alela, Cunning Conqueror | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever you cast your first spell during each opponent's turn, create a 1/1 black Faerie Rogue creature token with flying.
trans-unit.target: 每当你施放每个对手回合中你的第一个咒语时，派出一个1/1黑色，具飞行异能的仙灵／浪客衍生生物。

trans-unit.resname: WOC·3 | Alela, Cunning Conqueror | Card Text: Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: Whenever one or more Faeries you control deal combat damage to a player, goad target creature that player controls.
trans-unit.target: 每当由你操控的一个或数个仙灵对任一牌手造成战斗伤害时，煽惑目标由该牌手操控的生物。

trans-unit.resname: WOC·4 | Gylwain, Casting Director | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Gylwain, Casting Director
trans-unit.target: 选角督导桂尔温

trans-unit.resname: WOC·4 | Gylwain, Casting Director | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever Gylwain, Casting Director or another nontoken creature enters the battlefield under your control, choose one —
trans-unit.target: 每当选角督导桂尔温或另一个非衍生物的生物在你的操控下进战场时，选择一项～

trans-unit.resname: WOC·4 | Gylwain, Casting Director | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: • Create a Royal Role token attached to that creature.
trans-unit.target: •派出一个皇族角色衍生物并贴附在该生物上。

trans-unit.resname: WOC·4 | Gylwain, Casting Director | Card Text: Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: • Create a Sorcerer Role token attached to that creature.
trans-unit.target: •派出一个术士角色衍生物并贴附在该生物上。

trans-unit.resname: WOC·4 | Gylwain, Casting Director | Card Text: Paragraph 4
trans-unit.source: • Create a Monster Role token attached to that creature.
trans-unit.target: •派出一个怪物角色衍生物并贴附在该生物上。

trans-unit.source: When Liberated Livestock dies, create a 1/1 white Cat creature token with lifelink, a 1/1 white Bird creature token with flying, and a 2/4 white Ox creature token. For each of those tokens, you may put an Aura card from your hand and/or graveyard onto the battlefield attached to it.
Vigilance Ox Drover can't be blocked by Oxen. Whenever Ox Drover enters the battlefield or attacks, target opponent creates a 2/4 white Ox creature token and you draw a card.
"Ho, Shaggyfoot! Lumpton, pick up those hooves! Edgewall by sundown or I'll sell the lot of you to a witch!"

Enchant creature Whenever enchanted creature attacks, reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal an Aura card. You may put that card onto the battlefield. If you don't, put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield, then return up to two target Aura and/or Equipment cards from your graveyard to the battlefield attached to that creature. (If the Auras can't enchant that creature, they remain in your graveyard.)
"My story ends when I say so."

trans-unit.resname: WOC·9 | Archmage of Echoes | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Flying, ward {2} Whenever you cast a Faerie or Wizard permanent spell, copy it. (The copy becomes a token.)

trans-unit.resname: WOC·9 | Archmage of Echoes | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "The High Fae are capable of magics that would make even the great Gadwick himself seem little more than a clumsy apprentice."\n—Chulane, Teller of Tales
Flash Flying You may have Malleable Impostor enter the battlefield as a copy of a creature an opponent controls, except it's a Faerie Shapeshifter in addition to its other types and it has flying.

Flash When Misleading Signpost enters the battlefield during the declare attackers step, you may reselect which player or permanent target attacking creature is attacking. (It can't attack its controller or their permanents.) {T}: Add {U}.

Flying, deathtouch Whenever you cast your first spell during each opponent's turn, look at the top card of that player's library, then exile it face down. You may play that card for as long as it remains exiled, and mana of any type can be spent to cast it.

Flying Whenever one or more Faeries you control deal combat damage to a player, put a +1/+1 counter on Faerie Bladecrafter. When Faerie Bladecrafter dies, each opponent loses X life and you gain X life, where X is its power.

Flying Whenever one or more Faeries you control deal combat damage to a player, that player creates a 4/2 red Pirate creature token with "This creature can't block." The token is goaded for the rest of the game. (It attacks each combat if able and attacks a player other than you if able.)

You may cast Tegwyll's Scouring as though it had flash by tapping three untapped creatures you control with flying in addition to paying its other costs. Destroy all creatures. Create three 1/1 black Faerie Rogue creature tokens with flying.
"Your season has ended. We are eternal."

Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +5/+5 and has "Whenever this creature attacks, create a Monster Role token attached to up to one target attacking creature." (Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and has trample.) When Giant Inheritance is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, return it to its owner's hand.

Knickknack Ouphe enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it. When Knickknack Ouphe enters the battlefield, reveal the top X cards of your library. You may put any number of Aura cards with mana value X or less from among them onto the battlefield. Then put all cards revealed this way that weren't put onto the battlefield on the bottom of your library in a random order.
When Loamcrafter Faun enters the battlefield, you may discard one or more land cards. When you do, return up to that many target nonland permanent cards from your graveyard to your hand.
"Give me just a moment. I need to grow us a new bridge."

As long as Timber Paladin is enchanted by exactly one Aura, it has base power and toughness 3/3. As long as Timber Paladin is enchanted by exactly two Auras, it has base power and toughness 5/5 and vigilance. As long as Timber Paladin is enchanted by three or more Auras, it has base power and toughness 10/10, vigilance, and trample.

trans-unit.resname: WOC·21 | Court of Ardenvale | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Court of Ardenvale
trans-unit.target: 雅登瓦廷

trans-unit.resname: WOC·21 | Court of Ardenvale | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When Court of Ardenvale enters the battlefield, you become the monarch.
trans-unit.target: 当雅登瓦廷进战场时，你成为君主。

trans-unit.resname: WOC·21 | Court of Ardenvale | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your upkeep, return target permanent card with mana value 3 or less from your graveyard to your hand. If you're the monarch, return that permanent card to the battlefield instead.
trans-unit.target: 在你的维持开始时，将目标法术力值等于或小于3的永久物牌从你坟墓场移回你手上。若你是君主，则改为将该永久物牌移回战场。

trans-unit.resname: WOC·22 | Court of Vantress | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Court of Vantress
trans-unit.target: 凡翠丝廷

trans-unit.resname: WOC·22 | Court of Vantress | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When Court of Vantress enters the battlefield, you become the monarch.
trans-unit.target: 当凡翠丝廷进战场时，你成为君主。

trans-unit.resname: WOC·22 | Court of Vantress | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your upkeep, choose up to one other target enchantment or artifact. If you're the monarch, you may create a token that's a copy of it. If you're not the monarch, you may have Court of Vantress become a copy of it, except it has this ability.
trans-unit.target: 在你的维持开始时，选择至多另一个目标结界或神器。若你是君主，则你可以派出一个为其复制品的衍生物。若你不是君主，则你可以使凡翠丝廷成为其复制品，但它具有此异能。

trans-unit.resname: WOC·23 | Court of Locthwain | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your upkeep, exile the top card of target opponent's library. You may play that card for as long as it remains exiled, and mana of any type can be spent to cast it. If you're the monarch, until end of turn, you may cast a spell from among cards exiled with Court of Locthwain without paying its mana cost.
trans-unit.target: 在你的维持开始时，放逐目标对手的牌库顶牌。于该牌持续放逐的时段内，你可以使用该牌，且能用任意种类的法术力来施放。若你是君主，则直到回合结束，你可以从以洛司温廷放逐的牌之中施放一个咒语，且不需支付其法术力费用。
